translations: n.轻巧细长的双刃剑，长剑
adj.（言辞，智力）机敏的，深刻的

phrs.translation: 剑杆织机；剑杆式投纬织机

sentences.sentence: Julie Burchill is famous for her rapier wit.
sentences.translation: 朱莉•伯奇尔以其聪慧机智闻名。

sentences.sentence: At last his rapier flew into the corner of the room.
sentences.translation: 最后他的剑飞进来了房屋的角落。

sentences.sentence: Our company is the most productive rapier one of the manufacturers.
sentences.translation: 我公司是国内最生产剑杆织机的厂家之一。
